about_the_game:
❤Game System


For the first time ever in a doujinshi game for adults, an interactive touch game with characters designed by 朝凪 Asanagi-sensei!
You can't miss the I-balanced (vertical split) illustration of a big-boob girl, which was drawn completely new for this game!

As she has grown through her VTuber activities, she has made a lot of enemies because of her cocky attitude.
One day, she wakes up in a strange room with a rope around her neck and an unstable foothold under her feet.
The game starts from such a situation.

This is a faphole simulator in which you train a weak pussy cow Vtuber who moves lukewarmly in Live2D by forcing her to become a slave.


She reacts to every operation in real time, and naughty animations are played back.
Please enjoy how her whole body shakes dynamically by insertion.
Her reactions, breathing, and sound effects are perfectly synchronized with the operations.
(There are no mechanically looping motions in this work. All motions are created by special physical and emotional parameters tuned to sex.)

You can switch between a variety of parts such as ball gags, ear tags, swimsuits, blindfolds, collars, squirting and spurting amounts, penis-size, tits, hips and thighs. This time, an interactive scenario is included! She is cocky at first, but as the training progresses, you will see her flirting with the cock in a very delicious way.

❤CV: 合歓垣天音(@amane_sopra)

.
This work is an official collaboration with a real VTuber!
This game includes many voices of Asanagi world in full bloom. The voice scenario changes in real time depending on your training.
All the dialogues are ball gag compatible! The realistic acting is a must-listen.
* The current PV is a provisional voice because the voice recording has not yet been done.

❤How to operate


The following parts of the body can be controlled by dragging the mouse
* Head
* Torso
* Boobs
* Thighs
* Male actor
There are differences in the way each part of the body moves when manipulated. Please try to find your favorite movement by manipulating various parts of the body.

You can also double-click on the following parts of the body to inflict blows.
* Head
* Torso
* Boobs
* Thighs
Use the blows effectively to advance your training.

You can drag and drag each part of the body to play, but you can take the game to the next level by using the multi-recording function.
Since multiple recordings allow you to take overlapping shots, you can create your own original animations by combining the movements of multiple parts, such as shaking the body in the first round of recording and manipulating the boobs in the second round of recording.
Please try to create your own favorite animation!

❤Emotional Engine!


Facial expressions now change automatically according to three parameters: impatience, pleasure, and pain.
If you move her suddenly and violently, she will feel more pain than pleasure, and her expression will change to one of pain.
It is up to you whether to make her face ecstatic with pleasure or distorted with pain.

The emotion meter in the upper left corner of the screen indicates how she is feeling.
The emotion meter can be viewed as follows.
  • Heart: Pleasure
  • Yellow rings: Irritation
  • Red rings: Pain
(You can visualize the correspondence between the intensity of the stimulus and the emotion by displaying the emotion graph in the settings. Please refer to this if you have difficulty controlling your emotions.)

❤reason, masochism


Reason and masochism can be changed by climaxing with pleasure or by climaxing while inflicting pain.
Depending on the status of reason and masochistic level, her emotions will change even if you give her the same stimulation.
Let's proceed with the training and make her a prisoner of pleasure.

❤Various functions!


■About the login bonus
When you start the game, you will receive a login bonus every day (23 hours after your last receipt). The login bonus will give you Gem, which is necessary to open the settings.
Gems can be earned through login bonuses, the climax bonus described below It takes about 2 days to open the basic settings, and about 5 days to open all settings. Please enjoy the gradual development each day.

■About the Climax Bonus
You can earn more bonus Gem for each time you climax up to 20 times in a day. If you can't make her climax well, try to increase the feeling of impatience. Try using the multiple recording function to touch various parts of the body at the same time. The multiple stimulation will surely satisfy her.

■Major Features
The facial expressions of the characters change according to the way they are inserted, their timing, and their emotions, and the onomatopoeia appropriate to the situation adds to the tension. 4K resolution drawings are beautiful even when enlarged to full screen.

❤Rich camera effects!


■Load your favorite images and videos as backgrounds.
You can load jpg/png/mp4 format files as background during the game.
You can load your own images and videos to recreate your favorite situations.

■Rich camera effects
You can turn on/off three types of camera effects: background light source effect, light diffusion, and reflection of contours by backlighting (rim light).
Using the background image as a light source, you can create a sense of atmosphere by adjusting the light diffusion and rim light.
Enjoy shooting your own emo videos.

❤Shortcut function!


Find your favorite situations with a variety of settings.
Up to 9 favorite settings can be registered as shortcuts (press the hamburger button in the upper right corner of the settings menu to open the shortcut settings menu).
You can also register up to 5 preset patterns. By presetting your favorite combination of settings, you can immediately play back the optimal scene.

❤Time stop !


Equipped with real-time switching function of time stop!
While time stop is on, the stimulation given to her will be accumulated, and it will attack her collectively after time stop is released (time stop can be used by saving Gem and unlock the setting).

It is possible to turn on the background transparency function when the background is hidden to make it a soothing desktop accessory. Touch and enjoy whenever you feel like it.

Record drag operation, repeat playback, function is available, and you can play your favorite inserted animation with both hands free.

❤Free video recording function!

You can export the game screen as an mp4 video file at any time.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content. The sexual content in this game includes SM-like sexual content, sexual assault/non-consensual sex, excessive piercings, obscene body paint, etc. All characters are over 18 years old.
